properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hanaraka Anao no iriko,
Na aiza no alehanao,
Jesoy, 'zay re no tiako :
Handeha eo anilanao.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Isan'andro sy isan'ora
Ho Anao, ho Anao,
Ka na iza no hanakora :
Ho Anao, aminao.
(Tsy hiala aminao).

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hanaraka Anao mba hanompo ;
Na aiza iantsoana,
Ho tahaka Anao, er ry Tompo,
Tsy kivy na sarotra atao.
Isan'andro, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hanaraka Anao na dia mafy
Ny adin'i Getsemane,
Hiara-mandresy 'lay rafy
Amim-pivavahana e !
Isan'andro, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Hanaraka Anao any ambony
'Zay be voninahitra ary
Ka tsy hahitana intsony
Ny zava-mahory ety.
Isan'andro, sns.
